prompts: Create a strong Pokemon that embodies the essence of steel with a majestic blue and gold design.
I want a mythical creature that resembles a powerful horse, showcasing unique colors and a regal stance.
Generate an image of a bipedal Pokemon with striking turquoise fur and sharp, golden accents.
Make a legendary Pokemon with a fierce look, combining elements of nature and strength in its design.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends steel and fighting characteristics, with a vibrant color palette and elegant features.
Design a majestic creature that symbolizes harmony and strength, with a unique color combination and distinct traits.
Show me a Pokemon that stands tall with a commanding presence, featuring beautiful shades of blue and gold.

distinctive_features: Golden horn-like structure on the head
